column5: OLD GOAT HOUSE - a SkyRun Texas Property    The Old Goat is a cabin-like home with interiors created with rustic, design finishes, and punctuated with whimsical Goat House Art. This quaint home features three bedrooms, each with it's own queen size bed, wall- mounted TV, and full bathroom. Linens and towels are also provided for your convenience.
